channel.title: EV Market on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in EV Market on FinanClub

item.title: VFS
item.description: score:71 Chances: VinFast is taking advantage of IRA funding and infrastructure bill opportunities to expand in the US and North America. The company’s participation in CES 2024 indicates its commitment to showcasing new EV concepts and models, signaling potential growth in the electric vehicle market.

item.title: ON
item.description: score:71 Chances: ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) is expected to capture more than 25% of the silicon carbide market by the end of 2023. The stock market is likely to be volatile in 2024, and diligent investors will find opportunities. These stocks have growth potential in 2024 and over the next decade because of megatrend tailwinds.
